video.title: El Secretario
video.synopsis: When a 30-year-old man living in New York discovers that he has a daughter in Bogotá, he moves there and takes a job as a secretary.

episodes.synopsis: Emilio Romero abandons his pursuit of the American Dream and returns home to Colombia when he learns that he has a daughter living there.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Resentful at being hired as a secretary, Emilio refuses the job but changes his mind upon learning how much supporting his daughter will cost.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Emilio has a modest place of his own and Antonia has given him back his job. But will he be able to live up to Lorena's demands about their daughter?
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Emilio's troubles at the office worsen when Mario becomes his second boss and gives him a task that could keep him from a meeting with his daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Lorena doubts Emilio's honesty when no one at his office knows who he is. Meanwhile, Antonia's friend (and Felix's lover) Paola eyes Emilio.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Olguita defends Emilio in front of his coworkers; a psychologist tells Lorena that Valentina has been traumatized by the truth about her father.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Emilio borrows Doña Dubis's apartment to impress Lorena. Later, Antonia discovers she has feelings for Emilio -- and that he may feel the same.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Doña Dudis reveals to Emilio that Antonia is in love with him, and he admits to feeling the same. Later, he makes a blunder that could get him fired.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Lorena is advised to let Valentina spend ample time with Emilio. Meanwhile, prompted by jealousy, Félix plans to propose to Antonia.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: At Félix's party, Antonia is unexpectedly charmed by the ring Emilio chose for Félix to give to her. Meanwhile, Olguita feels stood up by Emilio.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Antonia asks Emilio about the ring, suspecting it wasn't Félix's idea. Later, she helps Emilio when Franklin confronts him at the office.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: After Antonia agrees to marry Félix, Paola invites Emilio to lunch, making Félix jealous. Later, Emilio picks up the company mascot at the airport.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Emilio searches the building for Félix's dog, Copito, unaware that Mario has found him and is planning to use the dog to get Emilio fired.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Félix turns to Mario to help recover Copito, and Valentina finds money in the furniture Emilio borrowed from Antonia and hides it in one of her dolls.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: To recover Copito, Félix asks his underworld contacts to loan him more dollars. Meanwhile, Emilio and Antonia's relationship heats up.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Félix's men raid Emilio's apartment to find the hidden money. Meanwhile at work, a fire brings Emilio running to Antonia's aid ... or so he believes.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Mario berates Emilio, even though he saved him from the fire. Later, Lorena reprimands Emilio for leaving Valentina with neighbors.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: After Mario's browbeating at work, Emilio arrives home to find his home ransacked by Félix's men. Antonia is impressed with Emilio's new style.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: To everyone's surprise, the minister thanks Emilio for bringing him to his senses. Later, Emilio assaults a man who makes a pass at Antonia.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: When Lorena shows up at Copito Industries without warning and learns the truth about Emilio's job, she vows that he'll never see Valentina again.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Emilio overhears the truth about Milady's transfer and is targeted by a hit man because of the missing money; Franklin kicks Lorena out of the house.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: While meeting with Félix about their wedding, Antonia can't look away from Emilio, who's out with Olguita. Meanwhile, Valentina runs away.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Valentina shows up at Copito, and Antonia takes her to Emilio's apartment. Meanwhile, Sangre Azul's hit men are hot on Emilio's trail.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Emilio begins his new job at the ministry, Lorena laments the turn her life has taken, and authorities attempt to find the hit men.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: The men in the office are pleased with Mario's choice of a new secretary. Meanwhile, Lorena hatches a plan to have Emilio return to Copito.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Sparks fly between Emilio and Antonia when he stops by his old office. Meanwhile, Félix and Mario uncover Emilio's past trouble with the law.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Franklin moves in with Emilio, Paola tries to break up Emilio's relationship with Olguita, and Mario reveals Milady's secrets to her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Milady's husband kicks her out of the house, Franklin tries to patch things up with Lorena, and Emilio is assigned to work with Copito.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Antonia's dealings with Emilio lead some to suspect Copito of fraud; Franklin celebrates his newfound freedom from Lorena by drinking heavily.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Mario agrees not to fire Conde and Milady in order to get Lucila into his bed; Emilio and Antonia pull an all-nighter, as jealous Félix watches.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Emilio must step up as a parent when Lorena succumbs to depression. When Franklin can't find his car, the police wonder why Emilio has it.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Emilio clears the way for Antonia to work out the bid with the ministry. Meanwhile, Mario surprises everyone with his spiritual makeover.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Emilio is offered 500 million pesos to redirect the bid to another company. Meanwhile, Olguita's jealousy reaches the boiling point.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Amid the bribery rumors, Emilio is forced to quit his job at the ministry. Antonia, hearing the news, demands that Félix hire him again at Copito.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Emilio tries to get Lorena and Franklin back together, Lucila refuses to give in to Mario's advances, and Félix and Antonia share a night of passion.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Lorena and Emilio find themselves growing closer. Later, Olguita's attempt to seduce Emilio results in a trip to the emergency room.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Félix uses Yensi to ferret out info to use against Emilio, Antonia shows signs of dreading her upcoming wedding, and Mario continues to pursue Lucila.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Emilio's crush on Antonia reaches new heights when she invites him to accompany her to a wedding and he later sees her in her own wedding dress.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Félix tells Mario how he was able to keep Emilio from attending the wedding in Cartagena. Later, Félix is caught in a tryst with Yensi.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Emilio is welcomed into Olguita's family by her father. Later, he's caught completely off-guard when Lorena kisses him passionately during a visit.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Emilio and Antonia use their breaks to spend some time with each other, unaware that the Segura brothers are spying on them.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Félix forces Mario to make an illegal cash pickup, a shocked Lorena finds Franklin at her house, and Emilio catches Félix in a lie.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Doña Dudis prevents Emilio from telling Antonia of Félix's infidelity. Later, Emilio, Franklin and Lorena attend Family Day at Valentina's school.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: When Olga drops by Emilio's house, Doña Dudis gives her the lowdown on Emilio and Antonia's relationship; Emilio poses as Félix at a marriage class.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: The recovering Félix starts to think that Mario is under Lucila's spell when his brother suggests that they turn themselves in to the police.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Olga vows to finally make Emilio her own, Paola asks Emilio to find a stripper for Antonia's bachelorette party, and the cult starts to change Mario.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: When Emilio can't find a stripper for Antonia's bachelorette party, Paola insists he do the job himself. Meanwhile, Félix's scheme enrages Mario.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Emilio confesses to Doña Dudis what happened between him and Antonia the night before. Later, Mario tips off the police to Félix's stash of cash.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Mario thanks Félix for bringing him to his senses, Valentina is devastated by Franklin's departure, and Sangre Azul threatens to turn in Félix.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Lorena reconciles with Franklin. After Emilio bids an emotional goodbye to Antonia at the airport, Olga shows up ready to accompany him to Melgar.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: When Antonia's wedding dress arrives at Copito, Emilio plans to deliver it to her. This angers Félix, but it will soon be the least of his troubles.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: The revelation of Félix's criminal life has tongues wagging at Copito Industries. Meanwhile, Valentina stays with Emilio for a few days.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Antonia turns to Emilio for solace the morning after Félix's arrest. Meanwhile, Paola confesses her affair with Félix to her father.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: After calming the staff's fears at Copito, Antonia berates Mario for hanging her and Félix out to dry. Later, Paola tries to steal Félix's cell phone.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Olguita is worried that she's unable to become friends with Valentina. Meanwhile, Antonia begins to doubt Felix's innocence.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Paola celebrate Félix's return to prison as Mario takes control of Copito. Meanwhile, Valentina discovers Emilio's love for Antonia.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Félix enlists Mario and Paola's help in plotting Antonia's kidnapping. Meanwhile, Paola tells the press that Antonia and Félix's marriage was a sham.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Félix threatens to turn Mario in as his accomplice if he and Paola don't kidnap Antonia; Olguita's attempt to befriend Valentina turns disastrous.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: After barely surviving an attempt on her life, Antonia praises Emilio for saving her. Félix reserves his anger for Mario, who botched the job.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Félix continues to threaten Antonia with blackmail rumors, but things take an unexpected turn when she and Emilio get a call from the blackmailers.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Mario turns to Emilio for advice as he comes to terms with his sexual orientation. Later, Emilio ends up accompanying Antonia on a business trip.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: As Emilio leaves for Cartagena with Antonia, Lorena arrives to take Valentina away from him; Paola sends Antonia a video of Félix with Yensi.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Antonia turns to Emilio after seeing video of Félix with Yensi, and he comforts her with a song. Meanwhile, Mario visits a gay bar for the first time.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Antonia and Emilio celebrate a business victory in Cartagena, Lorena scolds Franklin for his laziness, and Mario deals with a ransacked apartment.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Emilio finally sets Olguita straight about their relationship, to Mario's delight; Antonia confronts Félix about the video of him and Yensi.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: As Antonia tries to cope with Félix's infidelity, Paola tells Emilio she knows what transpired between him and Antonia in Cartagena.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Mario continues to flirt with Emilio, who politely rejects his advances. Later, Antonia tells Emilio she regrets what they did in Cartagena.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Emilio hopes to convince Antonia that he truly loves her. Later, Olguita and her father try to trick Emilio by claiming that she's pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Félix gives Yensi a raise to keep her quiet about their tryst. Meanwhile, Mario tells Antonia that he found her ring at Emilio's house.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Olguita continues to manipulate Emilio with her pregnancy scam, Antonia decides to end things with Félix, and Franklin and Lorena have money trouble.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Mario makes the mistake of trying a new dish at dinner with Emilio. Félix's first move after his release is to confront Antonia about Emilio.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Olguita tortures Antonia with stories about being pregnant with Emilio's baby. Meanwhile, Félix plots to have Emilio killed.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Doña Dudis tells Emilio that she thinks Olguita is faking her pregnancy. Meanwhile, Patricio's beloved car is returned ... completely stripped.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Yensi blackmails Olguita, who gets shocking news about her supposed pregnancy. Patequiva's replacement -- Delfina's son -- starts work at Copito.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: Olguita lures Emilio to a motel for a night he'd rather forget, Paola tries to seduce Nelson, and Mario lends money to Emilio.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: After a surprise evening of romance with Olguita and an attempted seduction by Mario, Emilio is finally targeted by Félix's hit men.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: Félix and Antonia attempt to rekindle their romance. Meanwhile, Mario, Franklin and Olguita look for Emilio, who seems to have disappeared.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: While the staff at Copito wonders what happened to Emilio, Mario knows that Félix is responsible and confronts him as the search continues.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Franklin doesn't know what to tell Valentina when she asks where Emilio is. Meanwhile, Antonia is agitated by Mario's certainty that Emilio is dead.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: A night of tension unfolds as Emilio's release is arranged. Meanwhile, Nelson learns that a third party will join in his romantic evening with Yensi.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Delfina goes ballistic when she finds Nelson with Yensi. Meanwhile, Antonia fears that Emilio won't return to her after the rescue debacle.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: Mario finds the staff's glee at Félix's release unseemly when Emilio is still in danger. Meanwhile, as if to prove his point, Emilio's captors return.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Conde catches Aguirre and Milady together and the ensuing fight nearly demolishes the Copito offices. Meanwhile, Emilio lets Olguita know he's alive.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Lorena continues to live in denial about her poverty, Nelson berates Félix over the phone, and Emilio tries to find out who had him kidnapped.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Antonia forces Félix to attend couples therapy with her. Meanwhile, Mario finally faces the truth about Emilio, who plans to return to Olguita.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Antonia is invited to Olguita's engagement party, unaware that Emilio had even proposed. Meanwhile, Félix ejects Mario from the business.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: Conflicts arise at Olguita's engagement party, Nelson encounters Félix at Paola's apartment, and a lonely Mario joins Patequiva and Milady for dinner.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Nelson starts to believe that Paola is obsessed, Olguita's father announces that Doña Dudis is his soul mate, and Félix helps out Franklin and Lorena.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Doña Dudis agrees to be the one to tell Emilio that Olguita's pregnancy was a sham. Meanwhile, Nelson finally has had enough of Paola's obsession.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Olguita begs Emilio's forgiveness for her lie, which he grants. Meanwhile, Félix contrives to have Nelson fired, but Paola sees through his trick.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: Mario decides to commit suicide, but holds out hope of being rescued by a passerby. Meanwhile, Franklin tries to console a guilt-ridden Olguita.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Lorena hopes that Secretaries Day will be her big break in the scarf business. Félix changes the locks on Paola's apartment and leaves her destitute.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: After a night spent marking scarves, Félix starts to have feelings for Lorena. Meanwhile, Antonia begins to admit to herself that she loves Emilio.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: Félix agrees to let Mario return to Copito -- as a brand-new employee. Meanwhile, Emilio is tormented by new boss Lorena.
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: Antonia sees one of Félix's friends while dining with Emilio, whom she hides in the restroom; Lorena's power makes Franklin and Emilio's lives hell.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Lorena steals her new product idea outright from Franklin; Félix goes to bizarre lengths to win back Antonia as Paola tries to get Félix back.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: Félix seems to have lost both his sanity and Antonia. Meanwhile, the annual Copito bowling tournament brings out the worst in the board.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Paola scheme to undo Félix, Franklin starts to have serious feelings for Olguita, and Emilio and Antonia's love continues to intensify.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: When Emilio tells Valentina he has a girlfriend, she says she hopes it's Antonia; Antonia and Mario rush to the hospital when Félix is in an accident.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: Lorena nags Franklin for his laziness even as she steals his product idea. Meanwhile, Félix pretends to be an invalid to trick Antonia.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Emilio congratulates Lorena on her book idea, unaware that it's really Franklin's. Meanwhile, Félix reels in Antonia with his phony injuries.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: Antonia takes Félix home from the hospital. Later, Mario's confession forces Félix to drop the amnesia act, and he starts cheating with Paola again.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: Franklin finally learns that Lorena stole his book idea, and the chance dropping of a set of keys leads Antonia to discover all of Félix's secrets.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: Antonia overhears some of the secretaries discussing Félix's affair with Paola. When she learns that Emilio knew the truth, she turns her back on him.
episodes.title: Episode 104

episodes.synopsis: As tongues wag at Copito about Félix and Paola, Lorena insinuates herself into Félix's life. Later, Félix tries to apologize to a furious Antonia.
episodes.title: Episode 105

episodes.synopsis: Félix fights back jealousy over Antonia, who still refuses to see Emilio again. Meanwhile, Mario and Paola continue to scheme against Félix.
episodes.title: Episode 106

episodes.synopsis: Paola threatens to tell Félix about Antonia's affair with Emilio, Franklin and Olguita's relationship deepens, and Mario and Paola enact their scheme.
episodes.title: Episode 107

episodes.synopsis: Félix vows revenge on Mario for embezzling, Emilio begs Antonia to forgive him for not revealing Félix's infidelity, and Mario and Paola hide out.
episodes.title: Episode 108

episodes.synopsis: Félix, Lorena and the police investigate Copito's employees. Meanwhile, Paola learns some secrets about Mario as they hide out at his mother's home.
episodes.title: Episode 109

episodes.synopsis: Franklin confesses his love for Olguita to Lorena. Later, Antonia shocks Félix and Lorena by asserting her rights as Copito's co-owner.
episodes.title: Episode 110

episodes.synopsis: Antonia tells Emilio that she's back at Copito and he can be her secretary again. Meanwhile, Mario's stepmother tries to force him out of the company.
episodes.title: Episode 111

episodes.synopsis: Franklin's decision to move in with Olguita means he must say good-bye to Valentina, who is devastated; Emilio and Antonia try to save Copito.
episodes.title: Episode 112

episodes.synopsis: The French investors arrive to help Antonia save Copito Industries, Franklin gets a job offer from New York, and Félix and Lorena's love grows.
episodes.title: Episode 113

episodes.synopsis: Félix and Lorena's relationship falters when she learns that he hates kids; Emilio tries to keep one of the French investors from falling for Antonia.
episodes.title: Episode 114

episodes.synopsis: Already in trouble with the French investors, Antonia becomes jealous of Dorita, despite Emilio's claims that she's just a friend.
episodes.title: Episode 115

episodes.synopsis: Antonia grows jealous when she sees Félix with Lorena. Meanwhile, Mario and Paola disguise themselves and Dorita will stop at nothing to get Emilio.
episodes.title: Episode 116

episodes.synopsis: Lorena suggests to Félix that they try to track down Mario and Paola and get Copito's money back. Meanwhile, Emilio squabbles with Antonia.
episodes.title: Episode 117

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Paola are taken before the authorities, tax auditors investigate Copito, and Félix reveals to Mario that his mother stole the truck.
episodes.title: Episode 118

episodes.synopsis: Franklin and Olguita go their separate ways, Lorena and Félix feud after she gives away some of his things, and Mario tries to plea bargain.
episodes.title: Episode 119

episodes.synopsis: Mario connects the dots from Félix to Emilio's kidnapping for the prosecutor. Meanwhile, Antonia tells the Copito staff about her romance with Emilio.
episodes.title: Episode 120

episodes.synopsis: Emilio and Antonia revel in their renewed relationship, Félix forces Mario to work as a servant, and Lorena reflects on her life's downward spiral.
episodes.title: Episode 121

episodes.synopsis: As Emilio settles in to his role as Copito's new product manager, Mario and Sangre Azul are outside plotting to burn down the building.
episodes.title: Episode 122

episodes.synopsis: Félix holds Paola and Antonia hostage, but his actions are short-lived, thanks to Mario. As Copito celebrates renewed peace, Emilio marries Antonia.
episodes.title: Episode 123
